title: Does Motorola still produce new phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ever since Motorola Mobility was acquired by Google, the company has been making great budget smartphones. Recently Motorola launched 3 smartphones and Moto One Macro is one of them.  Features of Moto One Macro Display: 6.2” 1520 x 720 pixelsProcessor: MediaTek Helio P70 processor with 2.0GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G72 900Mhz GPUOS: Android 9.0Camera: 13MP main sensor, 2MP depth sensor, 2MP dedicated macro lens + 8MP selfie cameraMemory: 64GB, 4 GB DDR4Battery: 4000mAh, 10W rapid chargingPrice: Rs 9,999 The features of the Motorola One Macro include a quad-core camera set up, 6.2-inch display, an octa-core MediaTek Helio P70 processor, and a 4,000mAh battery. In terms of cameras, the Motorola One Macro will reportedly come with a 13MP main camera and two 2MP cameras, one of which would seemingly use a macro lens. On the front, the Motorola One Macro is said to come with an 8MP camera. This phone looks really interesting for the features and leaks also suggested that it might come for a really great price.
